plot: The Crew of a Sentinel unit( a 30 ton walking tank) is sent on a desperate mission to protect the flank of a retreating army from alien invaders.
title: Sentinel 2099
plot_es: The Crew of a Sentinel unit( a 30 ton walking tank) is sent on a desperate mission to protect the flank of a retreating army from alien invaders.
plot_en: The Crew of a Sentinel unit( a 30 ton walking tank) is sent on a desperate mission to protect the flank of a retreating army from alien invaders.
